# Project Detection Skill

> **Source**: `.ai-agents/skills/project-detection.md`

This is a platform adapter for GitHub Copilot.

When this skill is invoked, load and execute the instructions from:
`.ai-agents/skills/project-detection.md`

## Quick Reference

- **Purpose**: Detect project structure, technology stack, and conventions
- **Used By**: Conductor
- **Full Documentation**: See source file above
